name: ProjectionNode

methods.name: sum
methods.description: Returns the sum of a numeric field.

methods.name: avg
methods.description: Returns the average value of a numeric field.

methods.name: min
methods.description: Returns the minimum value of a field.

methods.name: max
methods.description: Returns the maximum value of a field.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Returns the number of rows that match the query criteria.

methods.name: unique
methods.description: Returns the count of unique values.

params.name: name
params.description: The name to use for this column. For example, this code defines the alias c: Wave.ProjectionNode[] projs = new Wave.ProjectionNode[]{Wave.QueryBuilder.count().alias('c')};

description: Add aggregate functions to the query, or define an alias.
